name: biobin
title: BioBin
summary: The rare variant binning tool BioBin

inputSpec.name: variants_vcfgz
inputSpec.label: VCF File
inputSpec.help: The genotyped variants in block-gzipped VCF format.

inputSpec.name: phenotype_phe
inputSpec.label: Phenotype File
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A phenotype file as a plain text file that contains two or more columns separated by whitespace.

inputSpec.name: covariate_cov
inputSpec.label: Covariate File
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A covariate file as a plain text file that contains two or more columns separated by whitespace. If given, all covariates in this file will be used.

inputSpec.name: weight_wgt
inputSpec.label: Weight File
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A file containing custom locus weights.

inputSpec.name: include_region_gen
inputSpec.label: Region Names List
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A file containing a list of names of regions to include from LOKI when constructing bins.

inputSpec.name: loki_db
inputSpec.label: LOKI Knowledge Database
inputSpec.help: A file, as the Library of Knowledge Integration (LOKI) database, which contains diverse biological knowledge from multiple collections of publically available databases.

inputSpec.name: regression_types
inputSpec.label: Regression Type
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A list of statistical tests to perform on each bin.

inputSpec.name: output_prefix
inputSpec.label: Output File Prefix
inputSpec.help: A string, setup for the prefix of the output files.

inputSpec.name: permu_count
inputSpec.label: Permutation Count
inputSpec.help: (Optional) An integer for permutation count. Use 0 to disable permutation.

outputSpec.name: log_file
outputSpec.label: Log File
outputSpec.help: A file, with log information from the job.

outputSpec.name: bins_files
outputSpec.label: Bins Files
outputSpec.help: A list of files, in CSV format with bins report.

outputSpec.name: summary_file
outputSpec.label: Bins Summary File
outputSpec.help: A file, in TSV format with summary information.

outputSpec.name: locus_file
outputSpec.label: Locus File
outputSpec.help: A file, in CSV format with locus information.

outputSpec.name: unlifted_files
outputSpec.label: Unlifted Variants Files
outputSpec.help: (Optional) A file, in CSV format with ulifted positions.

outputSpec.name: permu_file
outputSpec.label: Permutation Summary File
outputSpec.help: (Optional) A file, in CSV format with permutation summary.

details.whatsNew: * 1.0.0: First version of the Biobin app.
